PEPPYMETER_FIFO_PATH_TYPE_PAP: Obtain from Peppy ALSA Pipe plugin
PEPPYMETER_CHOOSE_TEMPLATE_FIRST: Choose a Template Folder first under General Settings.
PEPPYMETER_DOC_START_DELAY: Number of seconds to wait before starting PeppyMeter.
PEPPYMETER_DOC_TEMPLATE: Folder containing the meters to be displayed. Template folders are stored in "/data/INTERNAL/PeppyMeterPlugin/Templates".
PEPPYMETER_DOC_SCREEN_SIZE: If "Auto", screen dimensions will be based on meter images. Choose "Manual" in case wrong dimensions were obtained.
PEPPYMETER_DOC_SMOOTH_BUFFER_SIZE: Increasing this value will improve smoothness of meter movement, but too high a value can cause the meter to appear sluggish. Default: 8
PEPPYMETER_DOC_USE_CACHE: Needle cache can consume more than 100MB of memory per meter. Enable with caution on memory-constrained devices.
PEPPYMETER_DOC_FONT: Font to use for displaying track info.
PEPPYMETER_DOC_FIFO_PATH: Named pipe for reading visualizer data.
PEPPYMETER_RECOMMEND_PEPPY_ALSA_PIPE: For hassle-free configuration, install the Peppy ALSA Pipe plugin.
PEPPYMETER_DOC_LIST_METERS: Names of the meters to cycle through (comma-separated).
PEPPYMETER_DOC_CHANGE_INTERVAL: Number of seconds between switching meters. Default: 60
PEPPYMETER_DOC_EXIT_ON_PAUSE_STOP: Whether to exit PeppyMeter when player status changes to "pause" or "stop".
PEPPYMETER_DOC_EXIT_DELAY: Number of seconds to wait before exiting. Default: 0 (exit immediately).
PEPPYMETER_ERR_INVALID_START_DELAY: Start delay must be 0 or greater
PEPPYMETER_ERR_NO_METERS: No meters found in template folder {}
PEPPYMETER_ERR_INVALID_LIST_METERS: Invalid or missing meter list entries{}
